entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in wind prone areas this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
